title: Daily Briefing: Culture war in the Supreme Court
shortDescription: Supreme Court skeptical of Colorado's ban on conversion therapy. Here is the news to know on Wednesday.

title: ‘It’s not like it snuck up on us’: Tax credit stalemate in shutdown
shortDescription: Stalemate in Congress leaves millions insured by state marketplaces in limbo.

title: Trump-backed candidate wins primary for Tennessee special election
shortDescription: Matt Van Epps won the GOP primary for the Tennessee special election to fill the U.S. House seat left vacant by former Republican Rep. Mark Green.

title: Florida bill would make colleges rename streets after Charlie Kirk
shortDescription: A new bill would make all of Florida's public state universities and colleges rename one roadway on their campuses after Charlie Kirk.

title: Trump vs. Bad Bunny: A history of their beef
shortDescription: Trump said he's "never heard" of reggaeton superstar Bad Bunny. But they have intersected politically and culturally several times over the years.

title: 'Out of line.' Pam Bondi clashes with Senate Dems in testy hearing.
shortDescription: Bondi accused Democrats of "slander" against President Trump. Sen. Dick Durbin complained about her "refusal to answer the most basic questions."

title: Herschel Walker confirmed to join Trump team as an ambassador
shortDescription: Former NFL star Herschel Walker won Senate confirmation to be US ambassador to the Bahamas - a job that hasn't been filled for nearly 15 years.

title: Nobel Peace Prize will be announced Friday. Will Trump receive it?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has long wanted a Nobel Peace Prize. Many world leaders have said they nominated him. But most missed the deadline this year.

title: Jimmy Kimmel mocks Trump after beating him in popularity poll
shortDescription: Jimmy Kimmel joked on ‘Jimmy Kimmel Live’ that he's now "more popular" than US President Donald Trump, citing a new YouGov poll.

title: Trump DOJ official says Newsom staffer, senator put target on her back
shortDescription: Harmeet Dhillon says a California Gov. Gavin Newsom staffer and Connecticut Sen. Chris Murphy put a target on her back.

title: Trump comments on furloughed workers
shortDescription: During an Oval Office meeting with Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney, Trump said that some furloughed workers "don't deserve" back pay.

title: Trump says some furloughed federal workers ‘don’t deserve’ back pay
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said some furloughed federal workers “don’t deserve” to receive back pay when the federal government shutdown is over.

title: Florida lawmakers debate property tax
shortDescription: A House panel began a review of property taxes as it examines potential changes that could have a significant impact on local governments.

title: Will Trump pardon Diddy, Ghislaine Maxwell? Here is what he said
shortDescription: President Donald Trump was asked Oct. 6 about the possibility to pardon Jeffrey Epstein associate Ghislaine Maxwell and music mogul Sean Diddy Combs.

title: Trump calls Greta Thunberg 'so crazy'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump criticized Swedish activist Greta Thunberg for being "so crazy." The 22-year-old had a response to his comments.
